document.full_text: nine states will be eligible to compete for education grants of up to $50 million through president barack obama's "race to the top" program, the federal government said on wednesday.
document.title: education grants made available for nine states
lines_and_colors: nine states will be eligible to compete for education grants of up to $50 million through president barack obama's "race to the top" program, the federal government said on wednesday.
